Frogger

Status:

Alive

Scoreboard:

Score: 0

Game Instructions

The goal of this game is to get the frog to the logs without collisions with any objects

You are able to cross the green ground, but not hit any objects.

You are also allowed to cross the river, but only through the planks in the river.

Getting into any of the 3 logs (target) will give you 1 point and make you the winner of the game.

Or else, the game will be over.

Keyboard movements for frog:

1. Key "W" = Up

2. Key "S" = Down

3. Key "A" = Left

4. Key "D" = Right

* If game over, use Ctrl + R or (âŒ˜)-R to restart game (manual restart)
